name: Dispatch specialist
description:
Обязанности:

  • Outstanding organizational and multitasking abilities
  • Sound judgement and critical thinking
  • Must be able to multi-task as well as take the appropriate action with little supervision
  • Active listener with excellent communication skills
  • Fast typing with experience in data entry
  • Must be able to work under pressure
Требования:
  • Proficient in English (speaking and listening). Minimum 7.5 IELTS ( . )
    Russian ( communicable)
  • No experience needed. full training will be provided
  • Number of vacancies: 10
Условия:
  • Night shift / Day shift
